The doctored photo was published on Face: 2019, and has been shared more than 45,000 times. The photo shows Imran Khan sitting next to Navjot Singh Sidhu, both wearing yellow Sikh turbans.
The post: s Urdu-language caption translates to English as: “Wow Mr Niazi wow :( You did not carry the flag of Kashmiris, but wore Sikh's turban.” This refers to an incident where Khan allegedly declined to hold the Kashmiri flag during a protest in Islamabad.
A reverse image search on Google found t: proving that the claim of him wearing a Sikh turban is false.
The original photo was published on Khan: s verified social media accounts, including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and the ruling PTI party's accounts.
